subject: Re: [Read_Alphabet] Where's everyone gone?
msgSnippet: Hi Paige, ... I don t have a lot of experience with Linux, but if no one else in the group can help, I have a friend in the States who should have a solution.
messageBody:
Hi Paige,

>I believe I have to get some
> type of program to
> permit Linux to work with the truetype fonts.

I don't have a lot of experience with Linux, but if no
one else in the group can help, I have a friend in the
States who should have a solution.

Do you need to work on a doc in both Word and Linux?
If you complete a doc in Word and then convert to
either .pdf or .html Linux should be able to handle
these, at least to be able to see and upload them.

Let me know what it is that you want to do, and I'll
ask around,

cheers,
Michael

__________________________________________________
